column4: Anyone know the differences between Dapper and Edgy?  Some apps seem to act totally differently.
I have a semi-on/off-topic question.  What IRC clients are easily available under Ubuntu, and which are suggested.  The version of xchat that the current version of Ubuntu installs is strange.
search synaptic - and try them, then make up your own mind
if you don't like it, don't use it
